TASK: Change homepage settings
DOMAIN: browser

STEPS:
1. Open Google Chrome browser
   REASONING: Need to launch the browser application to access its settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.98)
   
2. Type "Chrome" to search for the application
   REASONING: Search for Chrome in the Windows search bar to locate and launch it
   ACTION: TYPE("Chrome")
   
3. Wait for search results to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for Windows to display search results
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)
   
4. Click on Google Chrome in search results
   REASONING: Launch the Chrome browser application
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.4)
   
5. Wait for browser to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure Chrome is completely loaded before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)
   
6. Click on the three-dot menu icon in top-right corner
   REASONING: Access the Chrome menu to navigate to settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.95, y=0.08)
   
7. Wait for menu to expand
   REASONING: Allow the dropdown menu to fully appear
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)
   
8. Click on "Settings" option in the menu
   REASONING: Navigate to Chrome's settings page where homepage options are located
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.85, y=0.35)
   
9. Wait for Settings page to load
   REASONING: Allow time for the settings interface to render completely
   ACTION: WAIT(1.5)
   
10. Scroll down to find "On startup" section
    REASONING: Homepage settings are typically located in the startup section
    ACTION: SCROLL(direction="down")
    
11. Wait after scrolling
    REASONING: Ensure the page has settled after scrolling
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)
    
12. Click on "Open a specific page or set of pages" radio button
    REASONING: Select the option to set a custom homepage
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.45)
    
13. Click on "Add a new page" button
    REASONING: Begin the process of adding a custom homepage URL
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.35, y=0.52)
    
14. Wait for URL input dialog to appear
    REASONING: Allow the popup dialog for entering URL to display
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)
    
15. Type the desired homepage URL
    REASONING: Enter the specific website address to set as homepage
    ACTION: TYPE("https://www.google.com")
    
16. Click "Add" button to confirm
    REASONING: Save the homepage URL setting
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.6, y=0.65)
    
17. Wait for confirmation
    REASONING: Allow Chrome to save the new homepage setting
    ACTION: WAIT(1.0)
    
18. Task complete
    REASONING: Homepage has been successfully configured with the specified URL
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The browser's homepage settings will be successfully changed to open a specific page (Google.com) on startup. The new setting will be saved and visible in the "On startup" section of Chrome settings, and the browser will now open to the specified page whenever it starts.
